summary: This is an email chain from August 26, 2019, regarding logistical coordination for a hearing in the Jeffrey Epstein case scheduled for the following morning. The email requests assistance from agents to help with victim support and managing press presence, noting an anticipated attendance of at least 20 victims.

events.title: Epstein Case Hearing
events.description: A hearing regarding the Jeffrey Epstein case is scheduled for 10:30 AM. At least 20 victims are expected to attend, with up to 30 anticipated. SDNY requested agent assistance for victim support and press management.

keyFacts: A hearing in the Epstein case was scheduled for the morning of August 27, 2019.
SDNY requested assistance from agents to help with victim support and to avoid the press at the hearing.
At least 20 victims were expected to attend the hearing, with close to 30 anticipated.
